name: part_003
file: tmp_【 ＃百鬼あやめ生誕祭2023 】Nakiriayame 6th BirthDay  ～Shoot the heart～ [FOai83VIogA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Ending of the previous song performance and transition.
Transition screen featuring silhouettes of the next guests and 'Are you ready' message.
Nakiri Ayame, Momosuzu Nene, and Inugami Korone perform 'Baby I Hate You'.

subtitles.original:
スキスキ絶頂症
作詞・作曲：koyori
subtitles.english:
Sukisuki Zetchoujou
Lyrics/Composition: koyori

subtitles.original: 満点採ったら褒め顔
subtitles.english: If I get a perfect score, praise me

subtitles.original: 私はそんな貴方も素敵に見えるわ
subtitles.english: Even that side of you looks wonderful to me

subtitles.original: 奇怪に起きた夏の戯れ
subtitles.english: A strange summer play that occurred

subtitles.original: もしやのもしや貴方に近づく好機会
subtitles.english: Perhaps, just perhaps, it's a great chance to get close to you

subtitles.original: ねえ…
subtitles.english: Hey...

subtitles.original: どきりとしちゃうでしょ
subtitles.english: It'll make your heart skip a beat, right?

subtitles.original: もう純情ぶって偽っちゃって
subtitles.english: Stop pretending to be innocent and faking it

subtitles.original: 好き好き絶頂症
subtitles.english: Love love peak condition

subtitles.original: 溶けちゃう前にさす
subtitles.english: Before I melt, I'll sting

subtitles.original: 貴方が頬張って
subtitles.english: You stuff your cheeks

subtitles.original: 噂になって強がっちゃって
subtitles.english: Becoming a rumor and acting tough

subtitles.original: 妄想絶好調
subtitles.english: Delusions are in top gear

subtitles.original: 呼び捨てにしてよ
subtitles.english: Call me by my name without honorifics

subtitles.original: 合点いかぬ蒸した夜
subtitles.english: A humid night that makes no sense

subtitles.original: 眠れず明くる朝まで貴方をひたすら
subtitles.english: Unable to sleep, I think of you until the next morning

subtitles.original: すってんころり滑稽に
subtitles.english: Tumble over comically

subtitles.original: 紳士に助けられたくて淑女を被る
subtitles.english: Wanting to be saved by a gentleman, I play the lady

subtitles.original: ねえ…
subtitles.english: Hey...

subtitles.original: あの娘を見ないで
subtitles.english: Don't look at that girl

subtitles.original: もう考えたって抗ったって
subtitles.english: No matter how much I think or resist

subtitles.original: 好き好き絶頂症
subtitles.english: Love love peak condition

subtitles.original: ベタベタしちゃうから
subtitles.english: Because things will get sticky

subtitles.original: もっと欲張って
subtitles.english: Be more greedy

subtitles.original: 恋愛成就にあやかったって
subtitles.english: Even if I'm blessed with successful love

subtitles.original: 妄想どっちつけ
subtitles.english: Which delusion should I pick?

subtitles.original: すれ違う貴方
subtitles.english: You, passing by

subtitles.original: 駄目駄目な私
subtitles.english: Good-for-nothing me

subtitles.original: ミルク味の溶けたアイス
subtitles.english: Melted milk-flavored ice cream

subtitles.original: 熱くなり赤くなる掌と頬
subtitles.english: Palms and cheeks becoming hot and red

subtitles.original: 垂れる垂れるぽたり落ちる
subtitles.english: Dripping, dripping, plop it falls

subtitles.original: 指伝い腕伝い甘い味
subtitles.english: Sweet taste trailing down fingers and arms

subtitles.original: もう純情ぶって偽っちゃって
subtitles.english: Stop pretending to be innocent and faking it

subtitles.original: 好き好き絶頂症
subtitles.english: Love love peak condition

subtitles.original: 溶けちゃう前にさす
subtitles.english: Before I melt, I'll sting

subtitles.original: 貴方が頬張って
subtitles.english: You stuff your cheeks

subtitles.original: 噂を聞いたどうやら本当
subtitles.english: Heard the rumor, apparently it's true

subtitles.original: 好き好き痛いんだ
subtitles.english: Love love it hurts

subtitles.original: 鳴呼　ねえ…　鳴り止まぬ
subtitles.english: Ah, hey... It won't stop ringing

subtitles.original: Next
subtitles.english: Next

subtitles.original: YOU
subtitles.english: YOU

subtitles.original: Are you ready
subtitles.english: Are you ready

subtitles.original: ヘイ！ちゅー！ヘイ！ちゅー！
subtitles.english: Hey! Kiss! Hey! Kiss!

subtitles.original: 心からあい！ヘイ！ちゅっ！ちゅっ！ちゅっ！ちゅっ！
subtitles.english: From my heart, love! Hey! Kiss! Kiss! Kiss! Kiss!

subtitles.original:
ベイビーあいへいちゅー
作詞：ナユタン星人 / ナナヲアカリ
作曲：ナユタン星人
subtitles.english:
Baby I Hate You
Lyrics: Nayutan Seijin / Nanawo Akari
Composition: Nayutan Seijin

subtitles.original: わえはっきり言うけどベイベー
subtitles.english: Hey, I'll say it clearly, baby

subtitles.original: あたし　なにからなにまであなたがノーセンキュー
subtitles.english: I'm "no thank you" to everything about you

subtitles.original: ヘイ！ちゅー！ヘイ！ちゅー！あい！ヘイ！ちゅっ！ちゅっ！
subtitles.english: Hey! Kiss! Hey! Kiss! Love! Hey! Kiss! Kiss!

subtitles.original: ああ距離が近いほどベイベー
subtitles.english: Ah, the closer the distance, baby

subtitles.original: 見えてくるくる気になるところの大バーゲン
subtitles.english: I start seeing more and more things that bother me, it's a bargain sale

subtitles.original: ヘイ！ちゅー！ヘイ！ちゅー！あい！ヘイ！ちゅっ！ちゅっ！
subtitles.english: Hey! Kiss! Hey! Kiss! Love! Hey! Kiss! Kiss!

subtitles.original: ほのぼのしてるこのお部屋で平穏はバイバイ
subtitles.english: Bye-bye to peace in this heartwarming room

subtitles.original: おんなじ世界じゃやってけない！
subtitles.english: I can't live in the same world as you!

subtitles.original: 言ってるアレコレ通じてる！？
subtitles.english: Are you getting all the things I'm saying!?

subtitles.original: なにからなにまでわかってよ！
subtitles.english: Understand everything from A to Z!

subtitles.original: あなたなんてもういーや
subtitles.english: I'm done with you

subtitles.original: …とはいかない毎晩考えてる　もうベイベーベイベー
subtitles.english: ...it doesn't work that way, I think of you every night, oh baby baby
